content:
Hello @Mark Scrimshire and @Saul Kravitz ,
Looks like the following JSON files with search parameter definitions contains the misprint in expression field. The corresponding structure definition is missing the field from expression.
SearchParameter-plannet-available-start-time.json
Location.hoursOfOperation.availableStartTime -> Location.hoursOfOperation.openingTime

SearchParameter-plannet-available-end-time.json
Location.hoursOfOperation.availableEndTime -> Location.hoursOfOperation.closingTime

Not sure if you are the correct addresses for the following request. Who may confirm that above correction proposal is valid?
Thank you, Alex

Received... don't be surprised if these search parameters go away in the next rebuild of the IG....we are pruning now.
I incorporated the fixes into my local copy in case these carry forward. Thanks!

Happy to get your feedback.
Probably best to post in the Davinci Pdex Plan Net stream with @Saul Kravitz ....
